trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition> of each branch is determined before the branch is run.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>de cada ramificação é determinada para a ramificação seja executada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>

trans-unit.source: The first IfElseBranchActivity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> that evaluates to `true` is run.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro IfElseBranchActivity no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>que é avaliada como `true` é executado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"> </xref> classe usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo usuário da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> object reference for the current branch activity.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> referência para a atividade de ramificação atual do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The evaluation of this condition returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: A avaliação dessa condição retorna um valor que indica se a ramificação deve ser executada.

trans-unit.source: This property is optional on the last <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> and required in other cases.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é opcional na última <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>e necessárias em outros casos.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> que retorna um valor que indica se a ramificação deve ser executada.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*>
